[E033] Error: readonly property `Foo\Bar\Baz::$foo` cannot have a default value
   ,-[code.php:6:34]
   |
 6 |      public readonly string $foo = "foo";
   *             ^^^^|^^^        ^^|^ |  
   *                 |             `----- property `$foo` is declared here
   *                 |                |  
   *                 `------------------- property is declared as `readonly` here
   *                                  |  
   *                                  `-- try removing this `=`
---'
